Author: rannend

Comment: That wouldn't work. Overtime is work exceeding 40hrs in a workweek, where employers are required to pay 1.5x base hourly rate for non-exempt employees under the Fair Labor Standards Act.  If you are a part time worker and your hours are increased but still less than 40, that's not overtime.
Author: Ok-Economist-9466
